evidence.claim: Sierra Home Health & Hospice utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company supports FHIR and HL7 protocols for health information exchange.
Sierra uses EDI X12 transaction sets for billing and claims processing.
They ensure HIPAA compliance in their cloud operations.
